problem.problem_statement: How can we use technology to keep bees safe?
problem.goalTitle: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

problem.problem_statement: What are the effects of ocean acidification on sea life?
problem.goalTitle: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

problem.problem_statement: How can controlled burns help manage wildfires?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can we stop cutting down so many trees?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: What can farmers do to protect bees?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
